TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BuildProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义一组用于在 ASP.NET 生成环境中生成源代码的属性和方法。

span.span: Defines a set of properties and methods for generating source code within the ASP.NET build environment.

summary.span: 此类为抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 生成环境使用要生成的源代码应用程序中的不同文件类型的对象。The ASP.NET build environment uses objects to generate source code for different file types within an application. 类派生自主要是为了提供源代码文件、 网页、 资源和其他自定义项。Classes derived from predominantly provide source code for files, Web pages, resources, and other custom items. 通常情况下，你不创建的实例直接类。Typically, you do not create an instance of the class directly. 相反，实现从派生的类，并配置实现使用 asp.net 生成环境。Instead, you implement a class that derives from , and configure the implementation for use within the ASP.NET build environment. 实例类用于对象以在已编译的程序集生成一个或多个文件。Instances of the class are used with objects to build one or more files into a compiled assembly. 一个实例以单独的文件，为相应的语言生成源代码并对象将合并每个提供的源代码到单个程序集的实例。A instance generates source code in the appropriate language for individual files, and the object combines the source contributed by each instance into a single assembly. 在 ASP.NET 生成环境中使用的实例类，以生成应用程序中的文件。The ASP.NET build environment uses instances of the class to build files within an application. 属性的类指示要生成的文件的路径。The property of the class indicates the path of the file to be built. 应用程序中的每个文件的文件扩展名映射到相应的生成提供程序。The file extension of each file within an application is mapped to a corresponding build provider. ASP.NET 生成环境初始化实例的每个文件基于文件扩展名，并使用要生成的源代码文件的方法。The ASP.NET build environment initializes a instance for each file based on the file extension, and uses the methods to generate source code for the file. ASP.NET 生成环境传递对象基于的首选的编译器语言和到文件的上下文方法生成一个或多个文件中的程序集时，以便实例可以参与对整个程序集及其文件的源代码。The ASP.NET build environment passes an object based on the preferred compiler language and the context of the file to the methods when building an assembly from one or more files, so that the instance can contribute source code for its file to the overall assembly. 若要定义的 ASP.NET 应用程序中的文件类型的自定义生成操作，你必须从派生类，实现用于生成文件类型的派生类中的成员并配置相应的文件扩展名的生成提供程序在应用程序配置文件。To define custom build actions for a file type within an ASP.NET application, you must derive a class from , implement members within the derived class for building the file type, and configure the build provider for the corresponding file extension within the application configuration file. 指定的文件扩展名为受支持的文件，并生成提供程序支持的代码文件、 Web 文件、 资源文件或所有文件。The specifies the file extension for supported files, and whether the build provider supports code files, Web files, resource files or all files. 使用`type`特性以指定生成提供程序实现的完全限定的类型名称。Use the `type` attribute to specify the fully qualified type name of the build provider implementation. 使用类，以指定生成提供程序应用到 App_Code 目录中的文件、 Web 内容目录，为全局或本地资源中的文件或所有文件。Use the class to specify whether the build provider applies to files in the App_Code directory, to files in a Web content directory, to global or local resources, or to all files. 使用`extension`特性以指定用于标识的文件扩展名的文件类支持。Use the `extension` attribute to specify the file extension used to identify files that the class supports. 使用类来检查生成的配置文件中的提供程序。Use the class to examine build providers in a configuration file. 有关配置的生成提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[（ASP.NET 设置架构） compilation 的 buildProviders 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384)。For more information about configuring a build provider, see [buildProviders Element for compilation (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384). 若要实现为自定义文件类型生成源代码的生成提供程序，从派生类，并替代方法生成的源代码的受支持的文件类型。To implement a build provider that generates source code for a custom file type, derive a class from , and override the method to generate source code for the supported file type. 生成的源代码添加到对象中的窗体的 CodeDOM 图，或作为表示物理源代码文件的内容。The generated source is added to the object in the form of a CodeDOM graph, or as content that represents a physical source code file. 如果生成提供程序需要特定的编程语言，重写属性以返回的受支持的编程语言的对象。If the build provider requires a specific programming language, override the property to return a object for the supported programming language. 如果生成提供程序不需要特定的编程语言，不会重写属性; 请改用基类实现，它指示生成提供程序可以使用任何.NET Framework 语言，如 Visual Basic 或 C#。If the build provider does not require a specific programming language, do not override the property; use the base class implementation, which indicates that the build provider can use any .NET Framework language, such as Visual Basic or C#. 若要实现为 Web 内容生成源代码的生成提供程序，从派生类并重写方法返回生成的类为。To implement a build provider that generates source code for Web content, derive a class from and override the method to return the for the class generated by . 重写方法生成的源代码提供支持的文件的类型。Override the method to generate source code for the type provided by the supported file. > [!NOTE] > 添加自定义对 Web.config 文件的类在 ASP.NET 网站中工作正常，但不适用于 ASP.NET Web 应用程序项目。Adding a customized class to the Web.config file works in an ASP.NET Web site but does not work in an ASP.NET Web application project. 在 Web 应用程序项目中，由生成的代码类不能包括在应用程序。In a Web application project, the code that is generated by the class cannot be included in the application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 应用程序项目预编译概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b940abbd-178d-4570-b441-52914fa7b887)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Application Project Precompilation Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b940abbd-178d-4570-b441-52914fa7b887). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的生成提供程序实现，继承自抽象基类。The following code example illustrates a simple build provider implementation, inheriting from the abstract base class. 生成提供程序重写， ，和基类的成员。The build provider overrides the , , and members of the base class. 该示例不包括的实现`SampleClassGenerator`类。The example does not include the implementation of the `SampleClassGenerator` class. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类为抽象类，不能创建的实例直接使用构造函数。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of directly using the constructor. 从派生时类中重写构造函数来实现在生成提供程序实现的自定义初始化操作。When deriving from the class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your build provider implementation.

public: virtual property System::Web::Compilation::CompilerType ^ CodeCompilerType { System::Web::Compilation::CompilerType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示生成提供程序为自定义文件类型生成源代码所使用的编译器类型。

span.span: Represents the compiler type used by a build provider to generate source code for a custom file type.

value.span: 只读 ，表示用于生成虚拟路径的源代码的代码生成器、代码编译器和编译器设置。

span.span: A read-only representing the code generator, code compiler, and compiler settings used to build source code for the virtual path.
The base class returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性用于编译的源代码的实现提供设置。Use the property to provide the settings for compiling source code for an implementation of . 属性是`null`如果生成提供程序不需要特定的代码语言用于生成和编译源代码。The property is `null` if the build provider does not require a specific code language for generating and compiling source code. 若要设置的值中的生成提供程序实现，使用对象或方法。To set the value for a object within a build provider implementation, use the or method. 属性指定用于生成和源代码编译为生成提供程序的实现。The property specifies the implementation that is used to generate and compile source code for a build provider. 属性定义用于将源代码编译为程序集的设置。The property defines the settings that are used to compile the source code into an assembly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的生成提供程序实现，继承自抽象基类。The following code example illustrates a simple build provider implementation, inheriting from the abstract base class. 生成提供程序重写， ，和基类的成员。The build provider overrides the , , and members of the base class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

param.span: 引用生成提供程序所生成的源代码的程序集生成器。

span.span: The assembly builder that references the source code generated by the build provider.

summary.span: 为生成提供程序的虚拟路径生成源代码，并将源代码添加到指定程序集生成器。

span.span: Generates source code for the virtual path of the build provider, and adds the source code to a specified assembly builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现为自定义文件类型生成源代码的生成提供程序，从派生类类，并重写方法生成的源代码的受支持的文件类型。To implement a build provider that generates source code for a custom file type, derive a class from the class, and override the method to generate source code for the supported file type. 通常情况下，生成提供程序的实现会读取属性，分析内容，并将生成的源代码添加到指定对象。Typically, a build provider's implementation reads the property, parses the contents, and adds the generated source code to the specified object. 你可以参与的窗体中的程序集源代码对象或 CodeDOM 图。You can contribute source code to the assembly in the form of a object or a CodeDOM graph. 若要将源代码添加到通过程序集对象，请使用方法。To add source code to the assembly through a object, use the method. 若要对程序集在 CodeDOM 图添加源代码，请使用方法。To add source code in a CodeDOM graph to the assembly, use the method. 如果生成提供程序特定的编程语言生成源代码，则必须重写属性以返回的受支持的编程语言的对象。If the build provider generates source code in a specific programming language, you must override the property to return a object for the supported programming language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个简单的生成提供程序实现，继承自抽象基类。The following code example illustrates a simple build provider implementation, inheriting from the abstract base class. 生成提供程序重写， ，和基类的成员。The build provider overrides the , , and members of the base class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/CS/Class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.SampleBuildProvider_2/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过使用此方法类的语法突出显示和设计器支持在 Visual Studio 中。This method can be used through the class for syntax highlighting and designer support in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对象创建的输入的虚拟路径和调用的生成提供程序实例方法对象。The method of a object creates an instance of a build provider for an input virtual path, and calls the method on the object. 基类返回`null`有关方法，指示未实现。The base class returns `null` for the method, indicating that is not implemented. 某些生成提供程序实现可以实现来代替方法。Certain build provider implementations can implement in place of the method. 一个通常使用对象返回虚拟路径的对象。A object typically uses to return a object for a virtual path. 但是，方法可用于指示对象可以从虚拟路径生成多个类型。However, the method can be used to indicate that a object can generate multiple types from a virtual path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType GetDefaultCompilerType() cil managed

summary.span: 返回应用程序中默认语言的编译器设置。

span.span: Returns the compiler settings for the default language in the application.

returns.span: ，表示应用程序中默认语言的编译器设置。

span.span: A that represents the compiler settings for the default language in the application.

returns.span: 基类根据应用程序配置文件返回默认编译器。

span.span: The base class returns the default compiler based on the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法要检查的生成提供程序的默认编译器类型。Use the method to examine the default compiler type for a build provider. 使用方法来检查特定语言名称的生成提供程序中配置的编译器类型。Use the method to examine the compiler type configured in a build provider for a specific language name. 基类确定默认编译器类型使用`defaultLanguage`属性的应用程序配置文件部分中的值。The base class determines the default compiler type using the `defaultLanguage` attribute value in the section of the application configuration file. 如果没有默认语言设置编译部分中的，使用设置的默认编译器类型语言提供程序。If there is no default language setting in the compilation section, the default compiler type is set using the language provider. 当派生自类，可以使用若要设置中实现的属性。When deriving from the class, you can use to set the property within your implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Web.Compilation.CompilerType GetDefaultCompilerTypeForLanguage(string language) cil managed
Protected Function GetDefaultCompilerTypeForLanguage (language As String) As CompilerType

span.span: A code language name.

summary.span: 根据指定的语言返回生成提供程序的编译器设置。

span.span: Returns the compiler settings for the build provider based on the specified language.

returns.span: ，根据指定的语言表示生成提供程序的编译器设置。

span.span: A that represents the compiler settings for the build provider based on the specified language.

returns.span: 基类根据应用程序配置文件返回该语言的默认编译器设置。

span.span: The base class returns the default compiler settings for the language based on the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检查特定语言名称的生成提供程序中配置的编译器类型。Use the method to examine the compiler type configured in the build provider for a specific language name. 使用方法要检查的生成提供程序的默认编译器类型。Use the method to examine the default compiler type for a build provider. 基类确定默认编译器类型使用中的元素属性的配置文件的对象。The base class determines the default compiler type using the elements in the property of the object for the configuration file. 这相当于检查和元素的配置文件的部分中的元素。This is equivalent to examining the elements in the and the elements in the sections of the configuration file. 例如，对于`language`值 VB，基类方法将返回对应的实例的配置设置的对象。For example, for the `language` value VB, the base class method returns a object that corresponds to the configured settings for an instance of . 派生自类，可以使用若要设置实现所支持的语言的属性值。When you derive from the class, you can use to set the property value for the language supported by your implementation.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 与生成提供程序的已配置编译器不匹配。

span.span: does not match a configured compiler for the build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现为 Web 内容，如.aspx 文件生成源代码的生成提供程序，从派生类类并重写方法以返回生成提供程序生成的类型。To implement a build provider that generates source code for Web content such as .aspx files, derive a class from the class and override the method to return the type generated by the build provider. ASP.NET 生成系统将文件编译为每个生成提供程序，并生成对象传递给方法。The ASP.NET build system compiles files for each build provider, and generates a object, which is passed to the method. 通常情况下，生成提供程序的实现使用方法属性输入的`results`对象以返回所提供的类型。Typically, a build provider's implementation uses the method on the property of the input `results` object to return the provided type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 ASP.NET 生成环境使用的实例时类生成的文件和加载已编译的程序集。The method is used by the ASP.NET build environment when using instances of the class to build files and load the compiled assemblies. 基类方法返回字段值，指示生成虚拟路径时，不需要任何特殊操作。The base class method returns the field value, indicating that no special action is required when the virtual path is built. 当派生自类，可以实现方法以返回不同自定义文件类型或虚拟路径的值。When deriving from the class, you can implement the method to return a different value for your custom file type or virtual path. 例如，如果重新生成虚拟路径将需要包含需在重新加载，你可以返回的对象枚举值从你方法。For example, if a rebuild of your virtual path requires the containing object to be reloaded, you can return the enumeration value from your method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法返回要读取的内容对象属性对象。Use the method on the returned object to read the contents of the property for a object. 在调用方法，则必须使用方法关闭对象并释放关联的系统资源。After calling the method, you must use the method to close the object and free associated system resources.

span.span: Opens a stream for reading from a specified virtual path.

returns.span: 打开的 ，可用于读取指定的虚拟路径的内容。

span.span: An open that can be used to read the contents of the specified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法对返回对象读取的虚拟路径的内容。Use the method on the returned object to read the contents of the virtual path. 在调用方法，则必须使用方法关闭对象并释放关联的系统资源。After calling the method, you must use the method to close the object and free associated system resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessCompileErrors(class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults results) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub ProcessCompileErrors (results As CompilerResults)
abstract member ProcessCompileErrors : System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults -> unit override this.ProcessCompileErrors : System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults -> unit

span.span: Compiler results.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，能够查看编译器错误消息，以便将其修改为提供更多信息。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, enables you to review compiler error messages so that you can modify them to provide more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常重写此方法，以便您可以修改编译器错误才能显示以使对用户更有帮助的错误文本。You typically override this method so that you can modify compiler errors before they are displayed in order to make the error text more helpful to the user. 这是在知道某些错误的上下文并且可以向用户如何解决这些问题提供信息的情况下很有用。This is useful in scenarios where you know the context of certain errors and can provide information to the user about how to fix them. 原始的编译器错误消息通常特定于特定的语言构造和可能不提供的真正原因或解决方案明显给用户。The original compiler error message is usually specific to a particular language construct and might not make the real cause or solution obvious to the user. 可以使用访问错误传递给方法的对象。You can access the errors by using the object that is passed to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ReferencedAssemblies As ICollection
protected: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ ReferencedAssemblies { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 表示要用生成提供程序生成的源代码进行编译的程序集。

span.span: Represents the assemblies to compile with the source generated by the build provider.

value.span: 程序集的只读集合，可由生成提供程序生成的源代码引用。

span.span: A read-only collection of assemblies that can be referenced by the source code generated by the build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 生成环境初始化可用于生成提供程序的引用的程序集的集合。The ASP.NET build environment initializes the collection of assemblies that are available for reference by the build provider. 生成的生成提供程序的源代码中引用的程序集可以使用公共类型。The source code generated by a build provider can use public types in the referenced assemblies. 引用的程序集集合包含的其他 ASP.NET 应用程序中生成的程序集和配置文件中的元素中列出的程序集。The referenced assembly collection consists of other assemblies built in the ASP.NET application, and assemblies listed in the element in the configuration file. 如果生成提供程序生成引用其他程序集的源代码，生成提供程序将使用的其他程序集添加方法。If the build provider generates source code that references additional assemblies, the build provider adds the additional assemblies using the method. ASP.NET 生成环境解析外部类型使用这两个引用的程序集添加的程序集编译期间生成提供程序和适用于引用的程序集的默认集合。The ASP.NET build environment resolves external types during assembly compilation using both the referenced assemblies added by build providers and the default collection of assemblies available for reference. 集合不包括程序集的引用添加的其他生成提供程序通过方法。The collection does not include assemblies that are added for reference by other build providers through the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void RegisterBuildProvider (string extension, Type providerType);
.method public static hidebysig void RegisterBuildProvider(string extension, class System.Type providerType) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterBuildProvider (extension As String, providerType As Type)
public: static void RegisterBuildProvider(System::String ^ extension, Type ^ providerType);
static member RegisterBuildProvider : string * Type -> unit

param.name: extension
param.span: 生成提供程序所针对的文件扩展名。

span.span: The file-name extension that the build provider is for.
The build provider class.

summary.span: 注册一个生成提供程序。

span.span: Registers a build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法注册而不是在 Web.config 文件中定义它们的生成提供程序。You can use this method to register build providers instead of defining them in the Web.config file. 有关生成提供程序的详细信息，请参阅类和[（ASP.NET 设置架构） compilation 的 buildProviders 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384)。For more information about build providers, see the class and [buildProviders Element for compilation (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384).

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Friend ReadOnly Property VirtualPath As String
protected public: property System::String ^ VirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示要由此生成提供程序实现生成的文件。

span.span: Represents the file to be built by this build provider implementation.

value.span: 只读字符串，指定要由此生成提供程序编译的文件的虚拟路径。

span.span: A read-only string that specifies the virtual path of a file to be compiled by this build provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虚拟路径对象是正在编译生成提供程序的文件的路径。The virtual path of a object is the path to the file that is being compiled by the build provider. 例如，如果已配置自定义类，以生成具有.abc，自定义扩展插件的 Web 站点中的所有文件，如果您的网站名称为 WebSite1，并且该网站包含一个名为 Example.abc，属性包含的值`/WebSite1/Example.abc`.For example, if you have configured a custom class to build all files in the Web site with the custom extension of .abc, if your Web site is named WebSite1, and the Web site contains a file named Example.abc, the property contains the value `/WebSite1/Example.abc`. 在应用程序中的每个文件的文件扩展名确定文件类型和文件类型的相应生成提供程序。The file extension of each file within the application determines the file type, and the corresponding build provider for the file type. ASP.NET 生成环境初始化对象的每个文件的文件类型，并使用要生成的每个文件的源的方法。The ASP.NET build environment initializes a object for each file based on the file type, and uses the methods to generate source for each file. 有关配置的生成提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[（ASP.NET 设置架构） compilation 的 buildProviders 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384)。For more information about configuring a build provider, see [buildProviders Element for compilation (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/40fa889d-5412-487a-b6a9-21eb011c2384).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property VirtualPathDependencies As ICollection
public: virtual property System::Collections::ICollection ^ VirtualPathDependencies { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 表示在生成提供程序生成代码之前必须生成的虚拟路径的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of virtual paths that must be built before the build provider generates code.

value.span: 字符串的只读集合，表示生成提供程序的该实例依赖的虚拟路径。

span.span: A read-only collection of strings, representing the virtual paths that this instance of the build provider is dependent on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是必须编译之前的虚拟路径的集合实例生成源代码。The property is a collection of virtual paths that must be compiled before the instance generates source code. 中的虚拟路径的程序集添加为引用到的编译实例。The assemblies from the virtual paths in are added as references to the compilation for the instance.
